column4: wow, installing a printer wasnt easy, can anyone recomend a label printer other than brother ql500, cause that stuff didnt wanna fly :P
Brother has their own drivers.. they are a pain to install but typically work..
I tried to follow their guide, but I get errors on each step - I feel as if I've messed up my system and reinstall and try again is the only way togo

perhaps.. Brother's most recent instructions including their .deb's have been better then in the last 2 years.. I've found you have to read all their instructions and write them down because they have "If you have "ubuntu" then do this first then do that.. "etc..
